text: A Little Vicious is a 1991 American short documentary film directed by Immy Humes about a dog in Connecticut about to be killed for biting people, until animal trainer Vicki Hearne steps in to help. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *A Little Vicious at The Doc Tank * Category:1991 films Category:1991 documentary films Category:1991 short films Category:American films Category:American independent films Category:American documentary films Category:American short films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about dogs Category:Films shot in Connecticut Category:Films featuring pets Category:1991 independent films
